title: In-N-Out Calorie Calculator
meta_description: Use this In-N-Out calorie calculator to find calories in popular menu items like burgers and fries, with full nutrition breakdowns and tweaks for custom orders.
assumptions: Standard hamburger: 100% beef patty, bun, lettuce, tomato, onion, Thousand Island-style spread; grilled, no cheese or extras.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, customizations, portion sizes, and preparation; values based on official In-N-Out data. Check app or site for latest.

quick_answer.text: A standard In-N-Out hamburger has 390 calories and 16g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Animal style (extra spread, mustard, grilled onions)
Protein style (wrapped in lettuce, no bun)

faqs.q: How many calories in an In-N-Out hamburger?
What are calories in In-N-Out Double-Double?
faqs.a: A Double-Double burger is about 670 calories.

faqs.q: How to calculate calories for custom In-N-Out orders?
faqs.a: Start with base item calories and add ~90 for cheese, ~170 for bun, or extras like bacon (~100 kcal).
Regular fries have 370 calories; ask for light or well-done to adjust.

faqs.q: Does In-N-Out provide official nutrition info?
faqs.a: Yes, via their website or app; values can vary slightly by location.
